name: Iphone SE 2
description: iPhone SE packs our most powerful chip into our most popular size at our most affordable price. It’s just what you’ve been waiting for.

reviews.name: Sophie
reviews.comment: Who wants to have a top of the range at low cost will not find better than this. The battery lasts for weeks.

reviews.name: Jane
reviews.comment: I am very satisfied with the product because it is in the quality / price ratio that Apple used to us.

reviews.name: Micke
reviews.comment: The iPhone SE 2020 exceeded my expectations ...
